  2. Let’s go after deepfake pornography sites – and the social media giants that peddle them  The Guardian
  3. Bipartisan AI bill aims to give journalists, artists control over content  The Hill
  4. The AI-focused COPIED Act would make removing digital watermarks illegal  The Verge
  5. AI Briefing: Senators propose new regulations for privacy, transparency and copyright protections  Digiday
